channel.title: Client Stuck at 1% [Cache Problem]
channel.description: Whenever I send someone my client to connect to my server it gets stuck at 1%. It's most likely because the person trying to connect does not have my server cache because the server is running and the ip in the client is correct. Could one of you wise people please explain to me how to add the cache to client. Thank you very much.

item.title: Client Stuck at 1% [Cache Problem]
item.dc:creator: @Replicate_Girl Replicate Girl
item.description:
@Replicate_Girl wrote:

[quote=“Heaven Rsps, post:2, topic:449704”]if its matrix source, are you sure you are portforwarding correctly? i recommend to use server checker tool.

otherwise im afraid i can’t help…[/quote]

I am using a matrix source, does that mean I don’t need to add an autocache downloader?
Also thanks for the advice I will check out the server checker tool.

Read full topic

Whenever I send someone my client to connect to my server it gets stuck at 1%. It’s most likely because the person trying to connect does not have my server cache because the server is running and the ip in the client is correct.
